author: Tasha Hegarty
title: Strictly Come Dancing: Twitter reacts to Iwan Thomas and Ola Jordan exit - Strictly Come Dancing Reality TV
text: No one wants to be the first couple to leave the competition, but tonight Iwan Thomas and Ola Jordan said goodbye to Strictly Come Dancing.As ever, Digital Spy was keeping an eye on Twitter to see what you all thought about tonight's show. © BBC / Ray Burmiston/Matt BurlemStrictly Come Dancing 2015 judges It's not just the dancing everyone's interested in: Was Tess attacked by a tiger on the way in? #strictly #scd— Marianka Swain (@mkmswain) October 4, 2015 Claudia fixed her eyes, so pleased for her #strictly— Oonagh Robinson (@OonaghRobinson) October 4, 2015 Claudia's dress, meanwhile, is a thing of wonder. #scd #strictly— Richard K Hornsey (@richardkhornsey) October 4, 2015 Jesus I thought Rod had popped a hip out then!! #strictly— nicola grogan (@nicolag88) October 4, 2015 Nearly saw Darcy's bustle! #strictly— Georgina Rogers (@curiousergeorge) October 4, 2015 Where did you get that hat @CraigRevHorwood? We think you look FAB-U-LOUS in it daah-ling! #Strictly pic.twitter.com/WbVaBzLw6K— BBC Strictly (@bbcstrictly) October 4, 2015 My dear nan would have described Rod Stewart's "singing" there as "like cats pissing on tin..." #strictly— Rich Thomas (@RichEThomas) October 4, 2015 There's something about Daniel O Donnell's side mouth that I quite like. Not something I ever thought I would say tbh. #strictly— James Brown (@Horrorhiker) October 4, 2015 If I had moments left to live I don't know if I would kiss my kids goodbye or spend it beating #Strictly judges in to 4 bloody corpses.— Cal Hal (@calwhisky) October 4, 2015 'The man … The woman … The woman … The man … The woman' - my wife telling me which of the dance partners in #Strictly is the famous one.— Damien Owens (@OwensDamien) October 4, 2015 Here's what everyone thought about the result:Iwan didn't get past the first *hurdle*...sorry #strictly #scd— Caz (@KookeCaz) October 4, 2015 Ola out first week. Not happy. Not worth watching now. #Strictly— Rob Douglas (@Douglas517Rob) October 4, 2015 Such a shame for @The_OlaJordan & @Iwanrunner I think given the chance to train more he would have improved massively & done well #Strictly— Caroline Watt (@CandyPRCaroline) October 4, 2015 That's a shame , I think there are worse dancers there than Iwan #Strictly— Geraldine (@Girlidene) October 4, 2015 The right person definitely went #Strictly— Natalie Lovett (@nattie1985) October 4, 2015Of course it's the right result. Poor Iwan didn't seem to realise he's a terrible dancer. #Strictly— Collymac (@collymac) October 4, 2015 Someone should tell him if a woman says "don't pick me up and fling me around", don't pick them up and fling them around. #Strictly— Sebastian Matthews (@AceFlibble) October 4, 2015 Right decision there. At least Ola'll be able to take her time over her Xmas shopping now. #scd #strictly— Richard K Hornsey (@richardkhornsey) October 4, 2015Strictly Come Dancing airs next weekend on Saturday, October 10 at 6.20pm and Sunday, October 11 at 7.15pm on BBC One with a Movie Week special.
